name: Cybil (Noratho)
description:
Cybil is a platformer where the player must utilize magnetic forces to push and pull themselves to places unreachable otherwise. It takes place in a cyberpunk lab where two people were experimented on and now can emit magnetic fields.  They must use these new powers to escape the lab.

This was done in a game jam over the course of 48 hours, as such there is only one level, but more may come in the future. 

Art: G.Sedi

Music + SFX: FutureYou

Programming: Noratho
